**Antique Appraisal Services Directory - Hamilton, ON**  

### **1. Overview**  
Hamilton offers specialized appraisal services through certified professionals covering art, jewelry/vintage watches (notably mid-century timepieces), furniture/decorative arts ($150–$300+ per item), estates/probate valuations ($250–$500+), insurance assessments ($100–$250/hour), collectibles ($75–$200/item). Most follow standardized methodologies aligned with *Appraisal Institute of Canada* guidelines[1][7].  

---

### **2. Antique Appraiser Directory**  

#### **Schinkel Appraisals**  
- **Specialty**: Residential/commercial property valuations; estate planning/apportionment; decorative arts/furniture authentication[1].  
- **Certifications**: Accredited AACI/CRA members (*Appraisal Institute of Canada*)[1].  
- **Years Active**: Over 15 years serving Southern Ontario markets including Burlington-Hamilton corridor via postal code L8H/L8L/L8E zones[1][9].  
- **Contact**: Online form submission at https://schinkelappraisals.ca/order-an-appraisal | Response within 24hrs | Fee quotes tailored post-inquiry[1].  

#### **Stan Jugovic & Associates Ltd.**  
- **Specialty**: Real estate-linked antiques/applied arts valuation reports accepted by insurers/banks/courts across Golden Horseshoe region since ~2000s era operations start date inferred via MCAP accreditation records)[9][10].   
- Certifications:**AACI-P.App designation (*Accredited Appraiser Canadian Institute*)[9].    
-**Contact:**905-515-5765 | stan.jugovic@gmail.com | Service radius extends into Ancaster/Dundas suburbs under postal codes L8G/L0R clusters alongside core city coverage zones(L8H etc.) **[No explicit website found]**.[9]
